```{r}

library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  textInput("var", "What's your favorite color?"),
  uiOutput("button_ui")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {

  observeEvent(input$but, {
    output$button_ui <- renderUI({
      actionButton(
        "but",
        "Press me!",
        style = paste0("background-color:", input$var, "; color:white;")
      )
    })
  })

  # Initial button (default color)
  output$button_ui <- renderUI({
    actionButton("but", "Press me!")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)


```
